name: mgn_bootstrap
description: mgnでbootstrapをベースにテーマ作るときはこれをつかうよ！

scripts.imagemin-all: npm run imagemin-png & npm run imagemin-jpg & npm run imagemin-svg & npm run imagemin-gif
scripts.build: npm-run-all css-compile css-prefix css-minify imagemin-all uglify
scripts.css-compile: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-glob-importer/dist/cli.js --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run css-compile & npm run imagemin-all & npm run uglify' ./src
